Package Assignment

Class OrderDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Assignment.OrderDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseInterface
    public class OrderDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseInterface
    Represents a class to store an array of orders to be called by the main function to act as a data storage
